code: import React,{useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import'./Addsign.css';import{FaHandPeace,FaCamera,FaCheckCircle}from'react-icons/fa';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function AddSign(){const[className,setClassName]=useState('');const[imageCount,setImageCount]=useState('');const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();if(!className||!imageCount)return;try{await axios.post('http://127.0.0.1:5000/start',{class_name:className,image_count:parseInt(imageCount)});alert('‚úÖ Capture Started!');}catch(error){alert('‚ùå Error starting capture');console.error(error);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"sign-capture-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h1",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FaHandPeace,{})," Hand Gesture Capture"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,className:"sign-form",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"\u270D\uFE0F Enter Class Name",value:className,onChange:e=>setClassName(e.target.value),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"number",placeholder:"\uD83D\uDCF8 Number of Images",value:imageCount,onChange:e=>setImageCount(e.target.value),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("button",{type:"submit",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FaCamera,{className:"btn-icon"})," Start Capture"]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"live-preview",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:"http://127.0.0.1:5000/video_feed",alt:"Live Video",width:"640",height:"480"})})]});}export default AddSign;
